draughts

Class DraughtsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.DraughtsModel

  • public class DraughtsModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a game of Draughts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraughtsModel(java.lang.String gameName, Player player)
      Constructs a new game of Draughts.
      DraughtsModel(java.lang.String gameName, Player player, Colour currentPlayer, java.util.Set<Piece> pieces)
      Constructs a game of Draughts from a save game.

      • DraughtsModel

        public DraughtsModel(java.lang.String gameName,
                     Player player,
                     Colour currentPlayer,
                     java.util.Set<Piece> pieces)
        Constructs a game of Draughts from a save game.
        Parameters:
        gameName - the name of this game.
        player - the Player object used to get the Moves from the users.
        currentPlayer - the colour of the current player in the game.
        pieces - the pieces left in the game.
